reviewText: This DVD is a great visual study aid for those of us who are beginner fencing students.  The techniques shown are precisely those I have learned in my classes, and they are demonstrated clearly.  I agree with the other reviews that the close-up and slow motion footage is invaluable for home practice.  I am so glad I purchased this DVD.

As I am writing this review it is my 4th week of Foil fencing and this DVD is exactly what I needed.  In my beginner class, a lot of terms and techniques are shown to us very quickly.  This DVD is great for breaking down and showing each fencing move so that I can practice and reinforce what I have learned in the class at home. Effective attacks and parries are shown with great detail showing proper foil and footwork.  A good investment.

A superb instructional DVD for both beginners and intermediates. Definitely the best I've found! Clear instruction and demonstration with great slow mo's to help you see how to do each move. The way each technique is broken down also really helped. Can't wait to get the Epee version.
Very good demonstration from muliple angles. As a beginner I was very pleased with the amount of information presented.
as far as instructional DVDs Co this has to be the best one ! I've only seen one other than this my friend has it it's not in a class with this one at all ! it ships from England say no more !
Actually usable and accurate. Not outdated.
I bought it for my son. He said that it does help him a lot. It is a good video for beginners and intermediate fencer to learn foil fencing.
Great learning tool, Easy to follow and very comprehensive. Hello my name is Inigo Montoya you killed my father. Prepare to die.
Third in a truly excellent series. Precise exposition of fencing fundamentals useful for novices and veterans alike. Great product! Buy it!
I guess I was expecting a little more from the DVD, but it was kind of boring and didn't cover the topics that I hoped it would.  If I had it to do over again, I would not buy this DVD.

I started fencing lessons a few weeks ago. This vid arrived a few days ago. It is a perfect supplement to my regular twice a week training. I can continue to work on my own between classes now. Perfecting my stance and learning different attacks and parries. It shows in detail and breaks down each move. This is a very well made DVD that you should buy if you are a beginner or intermediate. I recommend this vid to anyone wanting to supplement their regular training. You won't be sorry :).

As far as beginners DVD on fencing goes, I would rate this the best. It is thorough, detailed and easy to understand.

The camera angles are unique so as to allow the viewing a clear image of what technique or lessons is being taught. As mentioned it is also very thorough, covering basic stances to strikes and much in between.

I would use this as a Fencing 101 standard; that is, if you are teaching or learning the foil, this is THE DVD to start. More complete than any other I have ever seen by far.

Professional. Thorough. Detailed.

Highly recommended.
